title: Business Model Transformation Strategies in the Age of Technological Disruption: Simulation-Based Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of business models and adaptability to digital environments
context.additional_context: Program structured to cultivate strategic thinking in response to technological changes and enable experiential learning of actual business model transitions through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key factors of technological disruption and predict their impact on business models.
Learners can complete simulation tasks for designing adaptive organizational structures and learning cultures with over 80% success.
Learners can propose new business model transition scenarios by leveraging existing knowledge in VR environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
